Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mayflower Hotel and Apartments in London (Kensington), you'll be convenient to Kensington Roof Gardens and Imperial College London. This 4-star bed & breakfast is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Mayflower Hotel and Apartments.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Mayflower Hotel and Apartments.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Mayflower Hotel and Apartments in London (Kensington), you'll be convenient to Kensington Roof Gardens and Imperial College London. This 4-star bed & breakfast is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Accommodations are located at multiple addresses. Regional attractions include:

Kensington Roof Gardens
Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre
Stamford Bridge Stadium
London Natural History Museum
Imperial College London
Holland Park
Kensington Palace
Royal Albert Hall
London Science Museum
Albert Memorial
Victoria and Albert Museum
Brompton Oratory
Broadway Shopping Centre
Kensington Gardens
Hammersmith Apollo

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City)
London (LHR-Heathrow)

The preferred airport for Mayflower Hotel and Apartments is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Mayflower Hotel are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 37.4 km / 23.2 mi

The preferred airport for Mayflower Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:
Please note: Bookings made from 21/10/16-31/12/16 for stays from 08/01/17-28/02/17 -receive the following offer - Stay minimum of two consecutive nights in Small Double room and get a complimentary room upgrade. Stay minimum two consecutive nights in Luxury Double room, Luxury Suite or Deluxe Four Poster Double room and get a complimentary bottle of wine. Applies to bookings for Sunday - Thursday only. Excludes bookings for Friday and/or Saturday night. Upgrade room and wine type at discretion of the hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
